name.ja: ヴォイドヴェルグ・カタフラクトス

requirement.en: You Normal Summoned this card this turn and have another face-up DARK Attribute monster on your field.

effect.en: Send the top card of your Deck to the Graveyard. Then, if you sent a monster to the Graveyard by this effect, you can add 1 Level 8 Galaxy Type monster from your Graveyard to your hand.

ja.set_name: Deck Mod Pack: Double Star of the Assault!!
